colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ZHVA DMAR SNGAGS @007B PA GU RU BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA 'DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR MTHONG NAS, RGYAL KHAMS NYUL BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING YIG RNYING GI DGONGS PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, SNA TSOGS DBYIG CES PA SHING MO SBRUL LO MI'I DBANG PO WANG RATNA SIDDHI'I PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGAS BGYIS SO, , SARBA MANGGA LAm, , DGE'O,, ,,)
